precondition: The Start button is visible on the taskbar.
expected_results: The Start Menu will open, displaying program shortcuts and system options.

action: Click the 'ContrqPanel' label in the right pane of the Start Menu.
expected_results: The Start Menu will close, and the Control Panel window will open. The active window indicator on the taskbar will change to 'Control Panel'.

precondition: The Control Panel is in 'Category View' and the mouse cursor is hovering over the 'Appearance and Themes' category icon.
action: Move the mouse cursor away from the 'Appearance and Themes' category icon.
expected_results: The tooltip with the text 'Appearance and Themes' will disappear.

precondition: The 'Display' icon in the Control Panel Icon View is visible within the main content area.
expected_results: The main content area will display the 'Screen Saver' settings within the 'Display Properties' section. A monitor preview and the active 'Screen Saver' tab will be visible.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
expected_results: The dropdown list will expand, showing a list of available screen savers.

precondition: The 'Screen saver' dropdown list is expanded.
expected_results: The 'Screen saver' dropdown list will show '[None]' as the selected option, the 'Settings' button will become disabled, and the preview window will be empty.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box will open.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open. The 'Power Schemes' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Hibernate' tab will become active. A dropdown menu labeled 'System hibernates' will expand, revealing a list of time options.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open. The 'Power Schemes' tab is active.
action: Click on the dropdown menu labeled 'After 5 hours' next to the 'System standby' power-saving action.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with different time options for the 'System standby' action will appear.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Power schemes' tab will open, displaying options like 'Home/Office Desk', 'Portable/Laptop', and others. Additionally, 'start' and 'Appearance and Themes' buttons will appear in the bottom left corner.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active.
action: Click the 'Always On' option in the 'Power Schemes Dropdown Menu'.
expected_results: The 'Power Schemes Dropdown Menu' will be replaced with the text 'Always On'. The 'Save As...' and 'Delete' buttons will move to the right of the 'Always On' text.

precondition: The dialog box titled 'Power Options Properties' is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box will close.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open. The 'Power Schemes' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Hibernate' tab will become active. A 'System hibernates:' dropdown menu will appear, showing 'Never' as the selected option.

precondition: The 'Power Schemes' tab in the 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open. A dropdown menu related to a power-saving action is visible.
action: Click the 'Never' item in the  dropdown menu.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become the active view within the 'Display Properties' dialog box.

precondition: The 'Appearance and Themes' window is open.
action: Click anywhere in the 'Appearance and Themes' window.
expected_results: No visual changes should occur in the 'Appearance and Themes' window.
